tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: The Big Bang Theory Season 4 Promo Trailer
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Visit http://freemediaaccess.com for more on The Big Bang Theory
Coming this September.. New time, new night same theory.
All media is disclaimed and owned by CBS and their rightful authors and producers. No content or material is claimed as own by the publisher of this video.
Like this? http://www.fblikemania.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Ain't nobody does promos better than﻿ CBS!
TBBT Rules!!﻿ today is the day :D
This type of compilation is very hard to do. It takes hours of reviewing and filtering and﻿ then a delicate hand at balancing the final results so that everyone is treated fairly.
Download the full series for﻿ free from here w w w (dot)wupload(dot)com / folder / 501723 Remove the spaces. Enjoy and thumbs up if you like thumbs up !
NEW NIGHT, NEW TIME,﻿ SAME THEORY
i'm a big fan of TBBT. i finished the whole 24 episodes of season 4, and it was hilarious! the latest﻿ season was the most fun to watch. :-) looking forward to another season! :-)
thumbs up if your watching in﻿ 2011
